items.title: Implement User Authentication System
items.description: Develop and integrate a secure authentication system to manage user access and protect personal data.
acceptance_criteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can log in and log out successfully
Passwords are stored using industry-standard hashing algorithms
System locks account after 5 failed login attempts
Supports password reset via email verification
non_functional: Compliance with GDPR and OWASP security guidelines

notes: Authentication feature added based on feedback. Assumed requirement is for standard email/password authentication with basic security measures; no details provided on multi-factor authentication or social login.
